comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
As pennyrichardsca indicates with the other photo, these must be the wives of three democratic leaders:

Robert Crain, who was chairman of the committee that raised the guarantee fund which landed the 1912 Democratic National Convention for Baltimore.

Thomas Taggart of Indiana

Norman E. Mack, New York Chairman of the Democratic National Committeeman.

The date on the stamp is 6/1?/12 -- which is consistent with the date of the convention.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: swang - I agree with you.  I'm starting to tag the phhotos related to the 1912 convention as "1912 DNC" to keep track.
